title: Applied Deep Learning with PyTorch - Full Course
excerpt: In this course you will learn the key concepts behind deep learning and how to apply the concepts to a real-life project using PyTorch and Python.  You'll learn the following: ⌨️ RNNs and LSTMs ⌨️ Sequence Modeling ⌨️ PyTorch ⌨️ Building a Chatbot in PyTorch  ⭐️Requirements ⭐️ ⌨️ Some Basic High School
